description: man in white garment sitting on a bed with a large pillow behind him and his hands on a flower in his lap; other flowers are strewn around him; the man's shoulders are hunched and he has a worried look on his face
inscription: LRC in plate: Walter Gramatté / 18. | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: No 10566 E.54-I. B | LLC of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck 2. 25 [illegible] Abzüge. | LRC of sheet, in pencil: 106.-- | LLC and ULC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2091
signed: LRC of sheet, in pencil: Walter Gramatté / 18. | LL in pencil, below image: Der Kranke / mit den Blumen.
title: The Sick Man with the Flowers
